choices: Holy City Mariejoia (Shichibukai and their subordinates)
One of the Eleven Supernovas and their subordinates.
1.content:
You find yourself on a relatively small ship on the Grand Line. It was midday and you found yourself face to face with one of the Eleven Supernovas, Capone Bege. As he always did, he was smoking a cigar. He continued to look you over as he nodded to a couple of his henchmen, who then hoisted you by the arms and brought you over to him. He then took the cigar out of his mouth and spoke, "Well then, you're the rat we lent a couple million berries to three years ago, right? Well, it's time to pay up." You look nervous. You needed that money to help your family, but there was no way you could earn all that money back, so you ended up bounty hunting and, because of your lack of fighting skills, you failed constantly. However, on your most recent expedition, you were caught by Capone Bege before you got the money. As this was the case, you started to tear up, "I'm sorry, but I couldn't get your money, sir..."

Capone nodded to his henchmen, who then proceeded to start beating him up. Capone looked on, slightly amused before calling his henchmen off. "Well, if that's the case, you're going to be punished in the way only I know how. Hey Vinni, grab one of those small crates." As he said this, one of the larger henchmen left into the ship and brought back a wooden crate only about the size of someone's head. You noticed this and figured that you were going to be decapitated right on the deck. To your surprise, the henchmen let you go. However, it wasn't long before you started feeling weird as your entire world started growing. Before long, you were only a couple inches tall! Capone looks down at you before grabbing you in his hand, "As I said, only I can do this. I have eaten the devil fruit that controls sizes. That being the case, I have no use for one such as yourself. Therefore, I'll send you somewhere. What happens after that is up to the recipient."

Capone opens up the crate before chucking you inside. You try to get out, but the top closes and you can hear nails hammering down on the crate. After a minute or so, you hear the flapping of wings. It seems a mailbird has picked you up and is taking you somewhere! But where?
1.title: A deal gone bad.

11.content:
You haven't eaten in a while and you were wondering where exactly you were going. You just got shrunk by a mob boss pirate and now you were flying away in a crate. You doubted this day could get any worse until the crate you are in starts to fall before landing on the deck of a ship. The crate opens and you're greeted by the face of...

Luffy: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Monkey_D....

Zoro: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Roronoa_Z...

Usopp: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Usopp

Sanji: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Sanji
11.title: Thousand Sunny

111.content: You could see the giant face of "Straw Hat" Luffy, the man with the 300,000,000 berry bounty! While you would have normally tried to catch him to square your debt with Bege, you were much more frightened of him now that he was several times your size. While you were frightened of him, you couldn't help but notice that the expression on his face was that of...
111.title: Giant Luffy

choices: "We got a new Nakama in the mail!"
"We got a new Friend in the mail!"
"We got a new Slave in the mail!"
1111.content: You saw the giant 300,000,000 berry man just looking at you with a sense of joy and wonder. With that goofy look of awe in his face, lifted you out of your crate and started dancing around with you in his hand in usual Luffy fashion, chanting...
1111.title: Joy and Wonder

choices: "...take you to Chopper. He can help you!"
"...take you to Sanji. You must be hungry!"
"...show you off to Usopp! You're so cool!"
1112.content: Luffy looked at you curiously, "Hey there, little guy! What are you and why are you cowering? I'm not gonna hurt you!" You looked up a little and, in fear, you answered his questions, "I-I-I'm cowering b-because y-y-you're huge a-and you have a g-g-gigantic bounty on your head..." He cringes some more, but Luffy just starts laughing lightheartedly, "Hahahaha! Is that all? Don't worry, I won't hurt you, little guy! Anyway, I'm going to..."
1112.title: "What are you?"

11122.content:
"...take you to Sanji. You must be hungry!"

Before you could say anything he grabbed you roughly (not intentionally, just in a fit of excitement) knocking the wind from you and taking away any chance of protest you might have had. As Luffy pumped his fists up and down in a running stance you found yourself pistoning up and down, only able to catch glimpses of the ship's interior. Judging by the time it took for Luffy to get to the kitchen from the deck, the ship was quite large. The second Luffy crashed into the kitchen Sanji turned from what he was doing and shouted, "Out Luffy! There's no way I'm letting you get within one inch of the food in here after what happened yesterday!"

Luffy grinned at Sanji and said, "Sanji! I have something to show you!"

Sanji sighed and said, "You never listen do you? Whatever it is just show it to me so you can get out of here and let me get back to cooking."

Luffy held you up and opened his palm. You would have stood up and tried to face the giant cook but you were still dizzy from your wild ride. The best you could do was sit up and stare groggily into Sanji's visible eye. Said eye widened as he saw you. Luffy let you down on the counter and Sanji bent down examined you. You tried to scoot back so his face wouldn't be so close to you, but he stopped you with one finger pressing down on the coat you were wearing. After looking over you for a few minutes he straightened up and said, "What exactly is this?"

Luffy explained how he had found you in a box that had fallen onto the deck of the ship. Sanji bent down again and said, "So what happened to you?"

Feeling less dizzy you stand up and explain what happened to you from your borrowing money from Bege Capone, to being a failed bounty hunter, and finally about how he had shrunk you and put you in the box. When you were finished Luffy said, "Don't worry little guy! You'll be safe with us!"

He turned to Sanji and said, "So anyway Sanji can you get something to eat for him?"

Sanji sighed and said, "Fine. But I'm not going to..."

Before he could finish Luffy shouted, "Thanks!" and ran off. Sanji growled in frustration and turned to you. The fierceness in his gaze was enough to make you want to curl up in a ball. He grabbed a knife off the counter and went back to making lunch. Without looking at you he said, "I don't have time to entertain some guy so just stay put until I'm done."

You nodded out of habit and stood up. You walked down the counter past various giant food items and implements until you came to the end of the counter. It was a long way to the ground so you wouldn't be going anywhere anytime soon. You look back at Sanji and see he's moved to the stove. He doesn't seem too friendly. You remember from the Wanted posters that Sanji was worth 77,000,000 berries though there was something strange about him. You walk as close to the hot stove as you can get and shout, "Hey Sanji?"

Sanji looks over at you and says, "What?"

You look at his face and say, "Your face is a lot different from your poster. Why isn't your picture that goofy?"

Sanji glared down at you and you quail slightly under his burning gaze.
11122.title: Meeting Sanji

1113.content: Luffy certainly appeared not to have any clue as to who sent you, where you came from, or why you were there, but the shocked look on his face meant something. Luffy quickly closed the box and you were jostled around as you could feel Luffy running into a secluded area of the ship before opening the crate. He then said something rather interesting.
1113.title: Slightly shocked and nervous

choices: You are horrified and try to run.
11131.content: Luffy lifted you out of the crate and up to his face, though not too close, "I don't know how you shrunk or where you came from, but this is a private dream come true for me. You see, I always found myself thinking about little bugs and how it would be awesome if they were people that I could do whatever I wanted to them. I don't like showing this side of myself in public, but now that I finally have a real live little guy in my hands, I am going to make you my slave, okay?"
11131.title: Luffy the Microphile

choices: He places you in his underwear and...
111312.content: You don't know why, but even though Luffy was trying to enslave you, you didn't feel any fear or misery. Was it how he said it? You didn't know and you were completely confused, but.. did you WANT Luffy to enslave you deep down? You could only wish you knew, but you decided to nod and speak, "I guess being your slave wouldn't be so bad, right?" Luffy was a little surprised with the answer, but then smiled widely, "Awesome! I wasn't expecting you to be willing! Well then, what shall I have you do first...?"
111312.title: You are oddly understanding.

1113121.content: Luffy sets you down on the ground before taking off one of his flip-flops. He smiles as he lifts you up and lowers you toward...
1113121.title: Something feet-related.

choices: Zoro barged in to talk to Luffy in private.
Luffy took one foot away and replaced it with the other.
11131211.content:
Luffy lowered you right in front of his massive feet. Despite the fact that he always worethose sandals of his, the smell of his feet was rather potent. While most would have retched at the stench, you seemed to enjoy it. Luffy then spoke up, "I want you to rub and lick my feet, okay?" You nodded and shouted up, "Yes, Master!"

You approached the bare foot of the infamous pirate and placed both hands on his bare sole as you started rubbing. As you did this, you started to lick the sole slowly. For both of you, you were in heaven. After a few hours...
11131211.title: Worshipping Straw Hat's feet!

choices: "To be honest, I truly envy the little guy..."
111312111.content:
Zoro heard from Robin that you dash into this room a little flustered, so he barged in without warning. He saw the shocked face of Luffy. As he slowly looked down Luffy's body, he eventually matched eyes with your shocked face. Seeing you, Zoro jumped back aa few feet, making himself fall over backwards, "L-Luffy? I-Is that a... tiny man at your feet!?"

For the first time in Luffy's life, he was genuinely ashamed, "Zoro... I..." He couldn't find the words to explain himself, but there was no need. Once Zoro got over the initial shock' he stood up and, understanding the captain much more than everyone else, he frowned before walking over to his captain, taking a large step directly over you, and sitting down next to Luffy before taking his head into his own chest, "Hey, I understand... nobody's perfect you know! Also..."
111312111.title: Luffy and Zoro's Little Toy

1113121111.content:
Luffy was surprised and caught off-guard by what Zoro said, "Wh-What did you...!?" Zoro smiled a bit, "You heard me. I envy the little guy. I wish I could be shrunken down and placed at your feet too." You looked up at them both, blushing vividly at the attractiveness of the two giant pirates.

As if by fate, there was a small Den Den Mushi within the confines of the box and Capone Bege had heard something he had never heard before. Therefoire, long range and remembering how the Straw Hat Pirates tried to help him in the past, he started to concentrate on Zoro before using his Devil Fruit power to shrink him. Zoro started feeling the world and everything else get larger as he shrank to...
1113121111.title: As if by fate...

choices: Something To Do With You And Zoro
11131211112.content: Zoro was now 6 inches, he looked around, confused and dazed. "Wha- What the hell?" He muttered. You looked over to him and noticed that he was still much larger than you, you only being half his size. Luffy grinned and picked you and Zoro up in the same hand, you and Zoro where forced close together but you didn't mind, you blushed a bit as his muscular six inch body pressed uo against your 3 inch body. "This is so awesome!" Luffy said in excitement. Zoro seemed to be happy with this new situation, smiling and chuckling a bit. "What should we do first?" Luffy asked. "I don't know... let's let him decide." Zoro said, pointing down at you. You thought for a moment, then answered. You chose...
11131211112.title: A Second Tiny

choices: Luffy walks with you in sandal.
Luffy just sits there with you in  his sandal.
11131212.content:
You have always wanted to be in Luffys sandals the place where Luffy's wonderful feet has always been in, its one of those place that worth hanging out in after all he never seems to wear anything else, being only 2 inches tall mean that you can explore this strange world of his sandals plus maybe even ride in next to his big toe.

The smell is strong as you are put into it but it's a smell that you kind of like and it's such a cool smell, you start to walk around this strange place that smells of feet but you soon like it even more as time moves on.

Luffy grabs you and puts you up against the thong of his sandal, then he very carefully slips his foot back into it, you are surrounded by his big toe and the other one next to it.

This all to much but you like and hope this will carry on for hours.
11131212.title: ...his sandal.

115.content:
It was the face of...

Chopper: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Tony_Tony...

Franky: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Franky
115.title: More

choices: Pink hat with an X and some red shorts
A blue hat over another hat and a shirt
1151.content: You looked up to see the face of who you believed to be was the Straw Hats pet Tony Tony Chopper. Which let you know exactly where you are but knowing just installed more fear into you. You've heard rumors about the Straw Hats and they weren't all good. As you looked up at the reindeer in fear it surprised you when his expression turned from curiosity to worry. "Hey it's okay I won't hurt you do you need any medicine?" Chopper asked you. You were a bit shocked that he seemed to be worried about you though. By the time you realized it though he had already put his hoofed hand near you, which caused you to flinch making Chopper pull his hand back. "I'm going to turn the box on its side so you can walk out on your own." Chopper told you obviously a little worried for the small human in the box. Nodding to let him know you understood Chopper started to turn the box. Now that you were able to walk out you decided to get out of the box. The first thing you saw was Chopper and he was wearing...
1151.title: Chopper

choices: Tells you he'll help you no matter what
Grabs you and pulls you into a hug
11512.content: You notice that he looks different from his bounty picture but it's to be expected since it was from 2 years ago. As you look around the ship it seems no ones around even though it's daytime. "Everyone's out since we just arrived at a new island and it's my turn to guard the ship." Chopper tells you thinking you were scared of someone else showing up. As you turn your attention back to him you feel you could probably trust him a bit since he seems to be willing to give you your space. Taking a deep breath you walk up to the gigantic reindeer to you and extend your hand for a handshake, while introducing yourself. Chopper who seems excited that you opened up to him a bit lightly taps your hand with his and introduces himself as well confirming that he was Chopper of the Straw Hat pirates. "You mentioned something about medicine, do you have one that gets rid of a devil fruits power?" You ask Chopper remembering his earlier off of medicine. "No sorry I don't have a medicine like that yet, but as a doctor I'll try to make one for my patient if they need one." Chopper answered you. What he said though took you by surprised as you weren't expecting him to be the doctor but you didn't say anything so he wouldn't get mad. Glad that he offered to make you medicine you smile up at him. "No it's fine it's my fault I'm like this I have to deal with the consequences myself." You tell him as you wonder if you're going to be living the rest of your life at your current size. Before you know it though Chopper...
11512.title: A blue hat over another hat and a shirt

12.content: It took a while, but the crate you were in finally landed somewhere. There was a lot of shifting and moving that you could both hear and feel from within your wooden prison. Suddenly, you are in the hands of a random person who then says, "Okay, this just arrived to marine headquarters this morning. It is to be sent to..."
12.title: Marine Headquarters Postal Offices

121.content:
He checked the label and then started writing while speaking to himself, "To Admiral..."

Aokiji: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Aokiji

Kizaru: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Kizaru

Akainu: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Akainu
121.title: "To Admiral..."

122.content:
The marine started writing something down while speaking to himself, "To Vice-Admiral..."

Monkey D. Garp: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Monkey_D....

Momonga: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Momonga
122.title: "To Vice-Admiral..."

123.content:
The marine started writing something down while speaking to himself, "To..."

Commodore Smoker: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Smoker

Commander Ripper: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Ripper
123.title: Another high-ranked Officer

124.content:
The marine started writing something down while speaking to himself, "To CP9 Agent..."

Rob Lucci: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Rob_Lucci...

Kaku: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Kaku
124.title: Tower of Justice (CP9)

choices: "A new member of CP9 with a Devil's Fruit? Interesting..."
"Why me? Why not Blueno or Jyabaka?"
1241.content:
Rob Lucci, I am writing to you concerning a new trainee I want you to train in thhe art of Rokushiki as well as in controlling a Devil's Fruit power. I'll send the trainee to you within the month. Signed, Fleet Admiral Sengoku..." Sengoku sighed he didn't want to burden Lucci but he had to get the darn teen trained or else he would listen to no one at all. After sealing the letter into it's envelope Sengoku handed it off to the delivery bird who put it into it's bag and flew off. He sighed. "I'm sorry Lucci..."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------
Lucci woke up to a faint tapping noise. Outside the window was a Mail deilvery brd with a letter. After retrieving and reading the letter Lucci's first reaction was...
1241.title: To CP9 Agent, Rob Lucci...

13.content:
Finally, the box landed somewhere. You suddenly hear footsteps as an old woman begins to speak, "Huh? What's this crate?" She goes over to reach for it to read the postage, "I see, it's a package for..."

Sir Crocodile: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Sir_Croco...

Dracule Mihawk: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Dracule_M...

Donquixote Doflamingo: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Donquixot...

Gecko Moria: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Gecko_Mor...

Blackbeard: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Marshall_...
13.title: Holy City Mariejoia

14.content:
You then feel yourself, and the crate, falling out of thin-air. The crate opens and you can see a pirate flag, the one of...

Eustass Kid: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Eustass_K...

Killer: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Killer

Trafalgar Law: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Trafalgar...

Basil Hawkins: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Basil_Haw...

Urouge: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Urouge

Scratchmen Apoo: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Scratchme...
14.title: One of the Eleven Supernovas and their subordin...

info.brief_description: You are shrunk in the world of One Piece! Try to survive!
info.description:
Good evening. This is my first interactive. In any case, before we begin writing, there are a few notes you might want to keep in mind:

1. This is an interactive for males only. Female Interaction is no longer allowed.

2. Any and all acts are allowed. But anything extreme (Toilet stuff, gore, etc.) should be marked with a warning in brackets, such as [Toilet Content Warning] or something. If this is not found, I'll edit the title of the chapter appropriately.

2b. If any chapter has any extreme content and is not properly warned about, please Please PLEASE don't hesitate to let me know. I can't fix it if I don't know it's there.

3. I want to keep this story neat and tidy, particularly with spelling and grammar. Don't be alarmed if you find your chapter has been edited for these reasons.

4. A single pet-peeve I usually have with stories is that characters often COMPLETELY take over a story in which another character was selected. Have as many characters as you want in a chapter, but make sure to have the selected giant be the one most prominent in the story.

4. Have fun when writing! Don't feel obliged to write!

Enjoy the story!
